description: This Python source file demonstrates how to implement human-in-the-loop functionality for executing external tools within an agent framework. It defines a Toolkit subclass for listing directory contents, sets up an agent with this toolkit, and handles external tool execution based on the agent's run response.

classes.name: ShellTools
classes.description: A Toolkit subclass that provides a method to list directory contents by executing a shell command.

methods.name: list_dir
methods.description: Executes a shell command to list the contents of a specified directory and returns the output as a string.
